application.doc: List Runtime Template Files Directory Contents

param.name: path
param.doc: Path within the template files root.

param.name: recursive
param.doc: Should a recursive directory listing be returned? (true or false)

method.name: GET
method.doc: To retrieve the certificate database names with the RESTful web service, issue a HTTP GET command on the Runtime Template Files resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

representation.name: Template File JSON
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: type
param.doc: Specifies whether this element is a file or directory. Valid values are "file" or "dir".

param.name: version
param.doc: The current version of file. This information is the last modified time of the file. A numerical number that indicates the number of seconds since the Epoch (00:00:00 UTC, January 1, 1970).

param.name: children
param.doc: If the type is "Directory", this entry contains the contant of the directory as an array. This field is only populated when the recursive option is specified in the request.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
